Attributes.DescriptionFormula: 'Total Mass of the payload'

Attributes.Name: ExplDataBlob
Attributes.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(Ability('Payload Type') = 0, true, false)
Attributes.AttributeFormula: AtbConstrArgs(Ability('Trigger Type'), Ability('Mass0'), Ability('TNT Equivalent'), Ability('Frag Mass'), Ability('Frag Count'), Ability('Frag Cone Angle'))

Attributes.Name: Liner Radius
Attributes.DescriptionFormula: 'Affects the shape and velocity of the slug'
Attributes.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(Ability('Payload Type') = 1, true, false)

Attributes.Name: Liner Cone Height
Attributes.DescriptionFormula: 'Affects the shape and velocity of the slug'
Attributes.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(Ability('Payload Type') = 1, true, false)

Attributes.Name: Liner Thickness
Attributes.DescriptionFormula: 'Affects the shape and velocity of the slug'
Attributes.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(Ability('Payload Type') = 1, true, false)

Attributes.Name: LinerDensity
Attributes.DescriptionFormula: 'Density of copper'

Attributes.Name: LinerVolume
Attributes.DescriptionFormula: 'volume of the cone liner'
Attributes.AttributeFormula: Ability('Liner Thickness') * 3.14159265359 * Ability('Liner Radius') * Ability('Liner Radius') + Sqrt( Pow(Ability('Liner Cone Height'),2) + Pow(Ability('Liner Radius'),2) )

Attributes.Name: Mass1
Attributes.DescriptionFormula: 'Total Mass of the payload'
Attributes.AttributeFormula: if(Ability('Payload Type') = 1, Ability('Explosive Mass') + Ability('LinerVolume') * 1000 / Ability('LinerDensity') , 0)

Attributes.Name: ShapeDataBlob
Attributes.GuiIsEnabledFormula: if(Ability('Payload Type') = 1, true, false)
Attributes.AttributeFormula: AtbConstrArgs(Ability('Trigger Type'), Ability('Mass1'), Ability('TNT Equivalent'), Ability('Liner Radius'), Ability('Liner Cone Height'))
